summary: I OWN A 2006 JEEP LIBERTY THAT HAD A RECALL REPAIR COMPLETED ON THE FRONT BALL JOINT PRIOR TO THE PURCHASE OF THE VEHICLE IN 2012.  SINCE THAT TIME, THE VEHICLE AGAIN HAD A PROBLEM WITH A BALL JOINT CORROSION IN THE SAME LOCATION RIGHT PASSENGER SUSPENSION.  JERRY ULM REFUSED TO REPAIR THE BALL JOINT UNLESS I PAID FOR THE UPPER AND CONTROL ARM..  I HAD TO REPAIR THE ISSUE AT A LOCAL SHOP FOR $500. NOW IT IS MAKING A TERRIBLE SOUND AND I TRIED TO GET ANOTHER DEALER TO REPAIR IT ON A RECALL BUT THEY REFUSED.
